snippet.title: Yume No Office Chapter 1 - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy On Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/29...

Play the demo and buy in itch.io: https://outsidercomet.itch.io/yumekawaii

Hello, this is Tsukasa speaking, and welcome to your new job. Here, we don't work from an office because your home is the office.

In this adventure, you are Kuta, a boy who was fired and luckily helped by his childhood friend Kaori. We are normal people, but when it comes to our performance bonuses, we fight using a very ancient method... The... Umm... Pong?...

The chapters will be released gradually. People who purchase the game will have access to all updates for free.

Voiced by Arucchi: https://fiverr.com/arucchi
